attributes.action: To make it mandatory for bicycles to have bells or alert mechanism.
attributes.additional_details: Being a pedestrian is becoming more dangerous due to more cyclists. Having bells on bikes is an easy way of making it safer to be a pedestrian.
attributes.background: To pass a law to make it compulsory to fit bells to all bikes sold in the UK.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/637202
